      • evaluate

        public String evaluate(Matcher rule,
                       Matcher cond,
                       Resolver resolver)
        Evaluate the substitution based on the context.
        参数:
        rule - corresponding matched rule
        cond - last matched condition
        resolver - The property resolver
        返回:
        The substitution result
